name: The Robot's Lips
description:
Kiss the humans to convince them how lovable robots are!

A short 2D platformer made in 4 days for Wizard Jam 5. I gathered the team and helped with bits and pieces of audio and art. We all designed together.

Credits:

Atlantic - music

Driadon - coding

DyslexiaKills - coding

ValorianEndymion - art

Vehementa - art
